title: The Peek-A-Boo ABC
description: Illustrated in full color. In this picture book that's full of surprises, an ark illustrates the letter A. Open the doors of the ark and see the animals inside. B's barn doors open to show a bear , C's car holds a clown , and so on. Toddlers will learn their ABC's with zest as they peek behind the doors in this delightful concept book.
author: Demi
